content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0) extracting iron ore, dropping into:
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5) storing iron ore.
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (-14.5, -46.5) transferring items from the chest to the furnace.

### Coal Mining and Iron Smelting Facility at Position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0) extracting coal, dropping into:
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -80.5) storing coal.
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (43.5, -80.5) transferring items from the chest to the furnace.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items without sufficient inventory
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into another entity. This will prevent errors related to insufficient items for insertion.

### Warnings about full chests
- Regularly check and empty chests that are full to ensure continuous operation of mining drills and other entities that deposit items into chests.
